Our cafés

Two locations in Portland. Same single-origin coffee, same commitment to craft. Drop in for a pour-over, pick up beans, or just say hi.

EMBER Pearl District

Our flagship café in the Pearl. Full menu, pour-over bar, and retail.

  • 1234 NW Everett St, Portland, OR 97209
  • (503) 555-0123
  • Mon–Fri: 6am – 8pm
    Sat: 7am – 8pm
    Sun: 7am – 6pm
Get directions

EMBER Division

Neighborhood spot on Division. Cozy seating, same great coffee.

  • 4567 SE Division St, Portland, OR 97206
  • (503) 555-0124
  • Mon–Fri: 6am – 7pm
    Sat: 7am – 7pm
    Sun: 7am – 5pm
Get directions
